mode we get the following.  Note that this worked before
for the same test ear.

It's not just WARs but also application clients too.
Also, we are going to need an WTP 1.0 M8-based patch for this.

Created an attachment (id=28405)
EAR with EJB and Web modules with same root name

This is an EAR that contains an EJB and Web module with the same root name
"BeenThere". Using slightly pre-M8 code, we are unable to export this EAR and
no error messages or log messages are available. We suspect it might have
something to do with these modules having the same root names.

With WTP M8 + latest patches, we hit this bugzilla while trying to import the
EAR. We need to ensure that the patch for this problem also ensures this EAR
can be safely imported and exported.

Created an attachment (id=28623)
Patch for o.e.wst.common.modulecore

Created an attachment (id=28624)
Patch for o.e.jst.j2ee

Reducing severity since an M8 based patch has been supplied; this is still a
problem in m9 which needs to be addressed.
Already dropped a patch for M8; changing back to M9 so it is fixed there.
*** Bug 113469 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
